f<-function(amint,j,data)
{
  for (i in 1:length(data$k))
  {
    if(grepl(amint,data$k[i],ignore.case = TRUE) == TRUE & i!=j)
    {
      data[j,2] = data[j,2] + data[i,2]
      #print(i)
      data[i,2] = 0
    }
  }
  return(data)
}
tb<-f("wifi",1,tb)
